DOC.brief_summary: To investigate impact supplement ferment Maillard react whey protein ( F-MRP ) natural killer ( NK ) cell activity , circulate cytokine serum protein level .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Fermented Maillard Reacted Whey Protein Immune Function
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled study conduct 80 participant without diabetes obesity . Over 8-week testing period , F-MRP group consume 6 g powder contain 4.2 g F-MRP day , whereas placebo group consume amount dextrin . NK cell activity ( % ) measure base ratio effector cell ( E ; peripheral blood mononuclear cell , PBMCs ) participant target cell ( T ; K562 cell ) E : T= 10:1 , 5:1 , 2.5:1 , 1.25:1 .
DOC.criteria: Able give inform consent The level white blood cell within range 3x10^3/μL~8x10^3/μL Males female 2070 year old Without severe complication Diabetes White blood cell 3x10^3/μL 8x10^3/μL Pregnancy breastfeed Hypersensitivity disease history milk protein Liver disease , inflammation disease , severe kidney failure disease Cancer , lung disease , leukemia , autoimmune disease Psychological neurological disease Myocardiac infarction cerebrovascular disease within 6 month screen Consumption test product drug within 1 month screen Inflammation related disease within 1 month screening
